https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fQyRszfnlXPFqQSWlqvdDDo42Ze.jpg Set in early 19th century Wallachia, Romania, a policeman, Costandin, is hired by a nobleman to find a Gypsy slave who has run away from his estate after having an affair with his wife. Aferim!
